meanings.definition: A device for measuring muscular work.
meanings.sent1: The ergographs displayed the amount of work my muscles did.
meanings.sent2: The scientist used the ergographs to measure the strength of the athletes.
meanings.sent3: I tried to trick the ergographs by flexing my muscles in a funny dance.
meanings.sent4: The ergographs whispered the secrets of my muscle power to the researchers.
meanings.sent5: The ergographs hummed with data, revealing the effort put into each task.

meanings.definition: A record of muscular work produced by an ergograph.
meanings.sent1: The ergographs showed a detailed record of my muscle activity.
meanings.sent2: The doctor analyzed the ergographs to understand the patient's physical exertion.
meanings.sent3: The ergographs seemed to have a mind of their own, documenting every muscle twitch.
meanings.sent4: The ergographs painted a picture of strength and endurance through their recordings.
meanings.sent5: The ergographs etched a story of hard work and determination in their lines.
